document_name: FOOD SECURITY ZOBA MAAKEL PRO DOC.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Previously this output focused on the following: dams and irrigation infrastructure were constructed/rehabilitated and degraded watersheds treated; and livestock (dairy, bee, poultry) production promoted through improved feed and forage development; farm productivity enhanced through supply of improved inputs.

As per the new cooperation agreement with the government, the output has been streamlined to fit the new Government priorities (water supply, health and sanitation) in 2012.

project_descr: Food Security & Sustainable Livelihood Programme in Zoba Maekel with the Ministry of Agriculture
project_title: Microdam Based Water Scheme in Zoba Maekel
